Overlook Hotel

Welcome to Alpine Haven Spa Hotel, a luxurious getaway nestled in the heart of the Alps. Our retreat offers a perfect blend of tranquility, rejuvenation, and indulgence. Immerse yourself in breathtaking landscapes and panoramic mountain views from our cozy accommodations. Our world-class spa and wellness facilities provide a wide range of treatments and therapies for ultimate relaxation. Indulge in exquisite dining experiences with locally sourced ingredients. Explore hiking trails, ski on world-class slopes, or enjoy leisurely activities like helicopter rides. We also cater to exclusive events and retreats. Experience the ultimate Alpine escape at Alpine Haven Spa Hotel.
